google_play_reviews.content: But it don't have the stability. In my note 4 it crashes simply by changing orientation to landscape to portrait. But it looks nice. Shame is not practical
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Well, crashing for you doesn't mean that it crashes for everyone. There are a lot of devices and Android versions, so some issues could only happen to certain devices. It is the first time I get an issue about the screen orientation. I have received the log with the issue and will try to fix ASAP. Thanks.

google_play_reviews.content: Great app! Whoa, it even has the option to choose the name variation of the extracted Apk. This is a must have app. Thanks for the app, keep it the awesome work :)
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi Valery, thanks for using ML Manager. Isn't it the same as setting the "Default filename for extracted APKs" as "Name"?
